main event: Unidentified flying objects were sighted near Bath, Michigan on July 15, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were observed in a formation of 8 to 10, traveling east to west.
The objects were elongated in shape, not round or spherical.
The objects appeared and disappeared quickly, within 6 to 10 seconds.
The objects were sighted approximately 20 degrees above the horizon in an east-southeast direction.
The sighting was reported to Detroit Air Traffic Control.
sighted object: 8 to 10 elongated objects in a formation
